name: Spheres of Damari
description:
The planet of Damari is rich with resources, and two factions wage war to be the only one remaining. Gather resources and defend your base from invading your opponent. Launch robots to attack, turrets to defend, and missiles to clear the field.

Credits:

Design, Programming, Art, and Sounds by CurtisCreates

Music by Jingle Punks

Requires 2 Gamepad Controllers to Play!
